column2: upon completion of the transaction that resulted in the stockholder becoming an interested stockholder the
stockholder owned at least 85 of the voting stock of the corporation outstanding at the time the transaction
commenced excluding for purposes of determining the number of shares outstanding 1 shares owned by
persons who are directors and also officers and 2 shares owned by employee stock plans in which employee
participants do not have the right to determine confidentially whether shares held subject to the plan will be
tendered in a tender or exchange offer; or
on or subsequent to the date of the transaction the business combination is approved by the oard of Directors
and authorized at an annual or special meeting of stockholders and not by written consent by the affirmative
vote of at least 66 2⁄3 of the outstanding voting stock which is not owned by the interested stockholder.
